content.p: Your guide to the July ceremonies Graduation is the highlight of our academic year, and we are really looking forward to celebrating with you. Here's where you can find all the information you need to prepare for the celebrations. 21 July - 1 August 2025 David Ross Sports Village, University Park Campus Beeston Lane Lenton Abbey Nottingham NG7 2RJ 1. Check your ceremony date and time Ceremony dates and times will be released in January 2025. Make sure you check when yours is and make a note of the date. 2. Keep an eye on your emails We will let you know when registration will open, along with detailed instructions on what you need to do. 3. Register how you'd like to graduate When registration opens, you will need to log in to NottinghamHub and complete the graduation form to let us know how you'd like to graduate. To ensure we have your correct information, please log in to NottinghamHub with your university username and password, and check the following details are correct: Check your name and address are correct
